characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. A white sedan is seen on the right side, overtaking the self-driving vehicle. A cyclist suddenly appears from the right side, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate rapidly.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates rapidly from 48 km/h to 8 km/h over the 10 seconds due to the sudden appearance of the cyclist from the right side. The vehicle maintains a safe distance from the white sedan overtaking on the right.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 2 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle. 2) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 1 meter away, suddenly appearing and moving into the vehicles path.
